welcome-new-contributors:
Hello %s! Welcome to Presto project!
Thank you and congrats for opening your first pull request. We will get back to you as soon as we can.
Please use [Contributing to Presto](https://github.com/prestodb/presto/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) as your guidelines
Thank you!
commit-number-changed-files-exceeds: - The commit %s has %d changed files, please consider splitting it to mutiple commits.
separate-subject-from-body: - separate subject from body with a blank line.
limit-subject-line: - limit the subject line to 50 characters.
subject-no-period: - do not end the subject line with a period.
